scripts.prebuild: rm -rf agent && cp -r ../agent ./agent && rm -f agent/.env agent/.env.* && rm -rf agent/outputs
scripts.build:frontend: cd ../frontend && npm run build && rm -rf ../cloudflare/public && cp -r dist ../cloudflare/public
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler deploy
